description: Exploration of interdimensional breaches and subsequent entity incursions. Focus on Entity 7\'s cognitive influence and containment. This includes analysis of its anomalous effects on local spacetime, potential for exploitation or defense, and the development of effective countermeasures.
researchContext: Investigation into the origins and nature of interdimensional entities, specifically Entity 7. Analysis of their impact on local spacetime and potential for exploitation or defense. Research includes the study of spontaneous reality fluctuations, temporal dilation, unexplained bio-signatures, localized gravitational anomalies, and cognitive distortion fields.  Development of containment procedures focuses on dimensional anchors, psychic shielding, temporal stabilization fields, reality integrity monitoring, and experimental neutralization protocols.
